name: Tiny Running Thief - Run And Jump Fighting Rivals Free
name_original: Tiny Running Thief - Run And Jump Fighting Rivals Free
description:
The legendary black ninja is ready for adventures with you! The game takes you back to the ancient far east world, where you have to perform a great run at a stary night. Run and jump with your spy ninja and go as far as you can. If you are too slow, the chinese samurai solders will catch you and your mission will be failed. So improve your skills and start your journey! Get the game NOW!

► Free Version - We save your costs!

► Award Winner Game - Best Ninja Theme ◄

"Watch out! It's very addictive! Cool gameplay, easy controls!" - Brian22

"This is a perfect game to pass time! Simple and GREAT!" - PabloE.

Features:
• Many stages to unlock! •
• Awesome graphics! •
• Simple controls! •
• Real challenge! •
• Traditional music and sounds! •
• Various difficulties for all ages! •
• Play single or start a competition! •
• Share your scores! •
